question: This bank partners Pantomath Advisory for MSME sector.
explanation: Yes Bank has collaborated with advisory services firm, Pantomath Advisory to develop a Micro Small and Medium Enterprises (MSME) ecosystem focused on Maharashtra and Gujarat. Yes Bank is following 'Alliances, Relationships & Technology (ART)' approach to digital banking and is thereby entering into partnership with financial technology (Fintech) firms to offer unique financial solutions to its customers. This collaboration with Pantomath Advisory is also a part of this approach and aims to enable better access to capital, knowledge and skills for helping MSMEs to scale up their businesses.
